embeds.title: Gilthunder (Fiche)

All-Lightning SR character. Essential for the Mines mission where his Lightning Spear adventure skill is required to redirect mine carts. Lance applies Paralysis via Shock combo for powerful damage windows; Sword & Shield provides a reflective Lightning Barrier; Longsword spreads Shock to multiple enemies.
